lines.text: Cut me down!
No!
I won't hurt you.
You're killing the world!
I'll go away... and I won't ever come back
[gives mischevious grin]

[You]
will?
Yes.
Careful what you look for. You just might find it.
Small Man, your end approaches but it is not yet. Take great care how you play.
Ice cream man, it's all in his head.
Now this won't hurt a bit. Well, maybe just a little bit.
Do you remember our old town. That last perfect day, before he came.
Some cops can be real assholes.
Where do you think you're going boy. Death is no escape from me.
Hey, we're not done yet.
Sorry baby, but yes we are.
I didn't abandon you Mike. I was taken.
I just had to be sure, before I killed my own brother.
Did you hear something?
It's just the wind. Only the wind.
We better move away from the car before the gasoline blows.
Wait! I thought cars only blew up like that in the movies!
[Car explodes in a huge fireball]
Yeah, me too.
